legacy_framework.description: Application uses legacy .NET Framework which requires migration to modern .NET

windows_service.description: Windows Service pattern needs conversion to modern Worker Service for containerization

msmq_messaging.target: Azure Service Bus or Azure Storage Queues
msmq_messaging.description: MSMQ is Windows-specific and not available in containers. Must migrate to cloud-native messaging

old_project_format.description: Legacy project format needs conversion to modern SDK-style

app_config.description: XML configuration should be migrated to JSON-based configuration

assembly_info.description: Assembly attributes should be moved to .csproj properties

complexity_factors.framework_migration: Major version jump from .NET Framework to .NET 10
complexity_factors.architecture_change: Windows Service to containerized Worker Service

requirements: Azure Service Bus or Storage Queue setup

phases.name: Project Modernization
tasks: Convert Windows Service to Worker Service

phases.name: Messaging Migration
tasks: Replace MSMQ with Azure Service Bus
Update message serialization (XML to JSON recommended)
Add retry policies and error handling

phases.name: Azure Deployment
tasks: Setup managed identity and Key Vault

risks: MSMQ message format compatibility during migration
Message ordering guarantees may differ between MSMQ and Azure Service Bus
prerequisites: Azure Service Bus namespace (Premium or Standard tier)

summary: Windows Service application using .NET Framework 4.8.1 with MSMQ messaging. Requires comprehensive modernization including framework upgrade, architecture conversion, and messaging platform migration. Medium-high complexity due to multiple legacy patterns and infrastructure changes.
recommendations: Start with project structure modernization to .NET 10
Use Worker Service template as foundation
Consider Azure Service Bus for reliable cloud-native messaging
Implement proper logging using ILogger for container environments
Use managed identity for secure Azure resource access
Implement health checks for Container Apps
team_skills_required: Azure Service Bus or messaging systems
Windows Service to Worker Service migration experience
